entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with local snow squalls near midnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 110 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls in the evening. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 90 km/h gusting to 120 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
